name: Oh Dear, the Signal Is Lost!
name_original: Oh Dear, the Signal Is Lost!
description:
Oh Dear, the Signal Is Lost!

Made for Game (JAM) Dev Cafè #1 

Theme: Lost Signal!

Despite technical issues that stole the first 5-6 hours of development, I feel this came out alright. I would have loved to have added more depth and text variety, but hopefully everything works well. Plenty learned while making this & it was a nice break from my other projects :) 

Thanks for playing!

Tools Used:

  • Unity for WebGL
  • Ableton for ambience + sounds
  • Photoshop for artwork

Note: There are performance issues when using Chrome, please try Firefox for smoother gameplay.
